article.title: The Great Gas Bubble Prick't; or, Computers Revealed - by a Gentleman of Quality
article.author: Mason, Ellsworth
article.text: In which are Exposed the delicious Delusions of those will-o-the-wisps; the Echoes is computerization of Phrenology, Haruspication, and other discredited Ancient sciences; and the moral and Mental decline of our Profession..
